metadata.name: Invoke-Obfuscation COMPRESS OBFUSCATION
metadata.comment: Detects Obfuscated Powershell via COMPRESS OBFUSCATION

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('new-object')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('text.encoding]::ascii')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('system.io.compression.deflatestream')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('system.io.streamreader')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('readtoend('))))

output.summary: Detects Obfuscated Powershell via COMPRESS OBFUSCATION
